meanings.sent1: The unaccredited school did not meet the government's standards.
meanings.sent2: The unaccredited university was not accepted by employers.
meanings.sent3: The unaccredited online course turned out to be a waste of time.
meanings.sent4: Her unaccredited diploma was like a fake jewel, shiny but worthless.
meanings.sent5: The unaccredited certificate hung crookedly on the wall, a symbol of deceit.

meanings.definition: Not having official authorization or approval.
meanings.sent1: The unaccredited doctor could not prescribe medication.
meanings.sent2: The unaccredited mechanic was not trusted to fix the car.
meanings.sent3: The unaccredited restaurant served mystery meat sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: His unaccredited license was a liability in the eyes of the law.
meanings.sent5: The unaccredited passport left him stranded at the border.
